import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Resource } from '../../DTO/resource'; import { ResourceService } from '../../Services/resource/resource.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { resources: Resource[] = []; @Input() title:string = "Liste de mes compétences"; listResource : Resource[] = []; constructor(private ResourceService:ResourceService){ this.listResource = this.ResourceService.getAllFromDB(); this.listResource.forEach(element => { console.log(element.title); }) // // WITH API // this.SkillService.getAll().subscribe(resultat => { // this.listCard = resultat; // }) } }
